09-12-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rejuvenating Aurora|Size=20} Rejuvenating Aurora no longer gets canceled when stamina is used
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rejuvenating Aurora|Size=20} Rejuvenating Aurora T3 reduced from 4% to 3.8%
- Kinetic {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse T1 reduced from 40% slow to 35%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20} Quantum Entanglement cooldown increased from 11s to 12s
08-29-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rejuvenating Aurora|Size=20} Rejuvenating Aurora can now be canceled by using Parry
- Fixed Kinetic {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse not traveling properly when cast near corners
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20} Singularity cast time increased from 0.1 to 0.2
08-15-2024: - Remastered Abrams, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pocket|Size=20} Pocket, and Dynamo weapon fire sounds
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rejuvenating Aurora|Size=20} Rejuvenating Aurora can now be canceled by using stamina instead of needing to manually exit first (pre T3)
- Fixed Kinetic {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse sometimes getting caught on stairs
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20} Singularity now has a 0.1s cast point
- Kinetic {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse width increased from 4.5m to 5m
- Kinetic {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse T3 increased from +115 Damage to +125
08-01-2024: - Kinetic {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse width increased from 4m to 4.5m
- Kinetic {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse recharge time reduced from 6s to 5s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rejuvenating Aurora|Size=20} Rejuvenating Aurora regen Spirit Power scaling increased from 0.4 to 0.5
07-18-2024: - Gun damage growth increased from 0.8 to 0.9
- Kinetic {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse spirit power scaling increased from 1.2 to 1.4
07-11-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20} Quantum Entanglement ally radius increased from 8m to 9m
06-27-2024: - Updated Dynamo's animation while using {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rejuvenating Aurora|Size=20} Rejuvenating Aurora
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20} Quantum Entanglement is prevented from being cast when Dynamo is rooted or movement-silenced (such as by Slowing Hex)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rejuvenating Aurora|Size=20} Rejuvenating Aurora T3 reduced from +5% to +4%
06-20-2024: - Updated reload animations for {AbilityIcon|Ability=Warden|Size=20} Warden, Dynamo, and Ivy
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rejuvenating Aurora|Size=20} Rejuvenating Aurora move speed increased from 3.8 to 4.2
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20} Singularity T1 radius reduced from +3m to +2m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20} Singularity falls 70% slower when Majestic Leap down is used (similar to the hero falling slower normally when casting the ability from an elevation)
06-13-2024: - Improved the camera when using Dynamo's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20} Quantum Entanglement
- Improved visibility of the edge of Dynamo's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20} Singularity
- Fixed Dynamo's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20} Singularity moving the Mid Boss
- Heroes HP growth per boon increased by +5 (there are 11 instances of these). This is not done for Abrams or {AbilityIcon|Ability=Dynamo|Size=20} Dynamo.
06-06-2024: - Fixed Dynamo's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20} Quantum Entanglement going through ceilings sometimes
- Base HP growth reduced from 48 to 44
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20} Quantum Entanglement fire rate bonus reduced from +30% to +25%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20} Singularity base radius increased from 8m to 10m
